title: Protein Engineering
description: This course covers the theory and practice of protein engineering methods, including specific examples of engineered proteins and their applications from the literature.
restrictions: __HEADER_0__Must be enrolled in one of the following Campuses:
prerequisites: CHEM 3511 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D or CHEM 3521 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D or CHEM 4511 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D or CHEM 3522 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D
